mapper.select: SELECT osf.*, flv.name as field_type_name FROM fd_object_scheme_field osf LEFT JOIN lookup_value flv ON flv.value_code = osf.field_type AND flv.type_code = 'field_type' WHERE osf.id = #{fieldId}

SELECT osf.*, flv.NAME AS field_type_name FROM fd_object_scheme_field osf LEFT JOIN lookup_value flv ON flv.value_code = osf.field_type AND flv.type_code = 'field_type' WHERE ( osf.is_system = 0 AND ( osf.organization_id = #{organizationId} AND osf.project_id IS NULL
OR osf.project_id = #{projectId} )) AND osf.code = #{fieldCode}

select t1.id, t1.code, t1.name, t1.field_type, t1.is_system, t1.extra_config, flv.name as field_type_name, t2.is_required as required, ffo.id as ffo_id, ffo.field_id as ffo_field_id, ffo.code as ffo_code, ffo.value as ffo_value, ffo.is_enabled as ffo_enabled from fd_object_scheme_field t1 join (
) t2 on t1.id = t2.field_id left join lookup_value flv on flv.value_code = t1.field_type and flv.type_code = 'field_type' left join fd_field_option ffo on t1.id = ffo.field_id order by t1.id desc

SELECT osf.id, osf.code, osf.name, osf.field_type, osf.extra_config, flv.name as field_type_name, ffo.id as ffo_id, ffo.field_id as ffo_field_id, ffo.code as ffo_code, ffo.value as ffo_value, ffo.is_enabled as ffo_enabled FROM fd_object_scheme_field osf LEFT JOIN lookup_value flv ON flv.value_code = osf.field_type and flv.type_code = 'field_type' LEFT JOIN fd_field_option ffo ON osf.id = ffo.field_id WHERE osf.organization_id = #{organizationId} AND (osf.project_id = #{projectId} OR osf.project_id IS NULL)
AND osf.id in ( SELECT osfe.field_id FROM fd_object_scheme_field_extend osfe WHERE osfe.field_id = osf.id
AND osfe.issue_type IN ('issue_epic', 'story', 'bug', 'task', 'sub_task')
AND osfe.issue_type IN ('issue_epic', 'feature')
AND osfe.issue_type IN ('backlog')
)
order by osf.id DESC, ffo.sequence ASC

SELECT osf.id, osf.code, osf.name, osf.field_type, osf.extra_config, osf.project_id, flv.name as field_type_name FROM fd_object_scheme_field osf LEFT JOIN lookup_value flv ON flv.value_code = osf.field_type and flv.type_code = 'field_type' WHERE osf.organization_id = #{organizationId} AND ( osf.project_id in
#{item}
OR osf.project_id IS NULL )
AND osf.id in ( SELECT osfe.field_id FROM fd_object_scheme_field_extend osfe WHERE osfe.field_id = osf.id
and osfe.issue_type in
#{item}
AND osfe.issue_type IN ('issue_epic', 'story', 'bug', 'task', 'sub_task')
AND osfe.issue_type IN ('issue_epic', 'feature')
AND osfe.issue_type IN ('backlog')
)
order by osf.id DESC

select t1.id, t1.is_required, t1.context, t1.project_id, t1.organization_id, t1.code, t2.id as page_field_id, t2.page_id, t2.is_display, t2.rank, t2.project_id as page_project_id, t2.organization_id as page_organization_id from fd_object_scheme_field t1 left join fd_page_field t2 on t1.id = t2.field_id where t1.scheme_code = #{objectSchemeField.schemeCode} and t1.is_system = #{objectSchemeField.system}

select t1.id, t1.code, t1.name, t1.field_type, t1.is_system, t1.extra_config, t1.is_required, flv.name as field_type_name, t1.is_required as required, ffo.id as ffo_id, ffo.field_id as ffo_field_id, ffo.code as ffo_code, ffo.value as ffo_value, ffo.is_enabled as ffo_enabled from fd_object_scheme_field t1 left join lookup_value flv on flv.value_code = t1.field_type and flv.type_code = 'field_type' left join fd_field_option ffo on t1.id = ffo.field_id where t1.code in
#{fieldCode}

select id from fd_object_scheme_field where id in
#{fieldId}

SELECT osf.id, osf.code, osf.name, osf.field_type, osf.extra_config, flv.name as field_type_name FROM fd_object_scheme_field osf LEFT JOIN lookup_value flv ON flv.value_code = osf.field_type and flv.type_code = 'field_type' WHERE osf.organization_id = #{organizationId} AND (osf.project_id = #{projectId} OR osf.project_id IS NULL)
AND osf.id in ( SELECT osfe.field_id FROM fd_object_scheme_field_extend osfe WHERE osfe.field_id = osf.id
AND osfe.issue_type IN ('issue_epic', 'story', 'bug', 'task', 'sub_task')
AND osfe.issue_type IN ('issue_epic', 'feature')
AND osfe.issue_type IN ('backlog')
)
ORDER BY osf.id DESC
